name: Britons
civilization_bonuses: Town Centers cost -50% wood upon reaching the Castle Age
Foot archers (excluding Skirmishers) have +1 range in Castle Age and +1 in Imperial Age (for +2 total)

name: Byzantines
civilization_bonuses: Buildings (except gates) have +10% HP in Dark Age / +20% HP in Feudal Age / +30% in Castle Age / +40% in Imperial Age
Spearman skirmisher and camel lines cost 25% less

name: Celts
civilization_bonuses: Sheep cannot be stolen if within one Celt unit's line of sight

name: Chinese
civilization_bonuses: Start game with 3 extra villagers but -50 wood and -200 food
Technologies cost -10% in Feudal Age / -15% in Castle Age / -20% in Imperial Age
Town Centers support 10 population instead of 5

name: Franks
civilization_bonuses: Farm upgrades are free (Mill is required to receive bonus)

name: Goths
civilization_bonuses: Infantry cost 35% less (starting in Feudal Age)
Villagers have +5 attack versus wild boar
+10 to population limit in Imperial Age

name: Japanese
civilization_bonuses: Fishing Ships have 2x HP and +2 pierce armor
Fishing Ships work +5% faster in Dark Age / +10% in Feudal Age / +15% in Castle Age / +20% in Imperial Age
Lumber Camps / Mining Camps / Mills are 50% cheaper
Infantry attack 25% faster (starting in Feudal Age)

name: Mongols
civilization_bonuses: Light Cavalry and Hussars have +30% HP
team_bonus: Scout line has +2 Line of sight

name: Persians
civilization_bonuses: Start game with +50 wood and food
Town Center and Docks have 2x HP
Town Centers and Docks operate +10% faster in Feudal Age / +15% in Castle Age / +20% in Imperial Age

name: Saracens
civilization_bonuses: Transport Ships have 2x HP and carry capacity
Cavalry Archers have +4 attack bonus against buildings
team_bonus: Foot archers have +2 attack bonus against buildings

name: Teutons
civilization_bonuses: Town Centers have +1 attack and +5 line of sight
team_bonus: Units are more resistant to conversion

name: Turks
civilization_bonuses: Light Cavalry and Hussar upgrades are free

name: Vikings
civilization_bonuses: Infantry have +10% HP in Feudal Age / +15% in Castle Age / +20% in Imperial Age
Wheelbarrow and Hand Cart are free

name: Aztecs
civilization_bonuses: +5 Monk hit points for each Monastery technology

name: Huns
civilization_bonuses: Houses are not required to support population
Cavalry Archers cost -25% in Castle Age / -30% in Imperial Age

name: Koreans
civilization_bonuses: Guard Tower and Keep upgrades are free
Towers (except bombard towers) have +1 range in Castle Age / +2 in Imperial Age

name: Mayans
civilization_bonuses: Start game with 1 extra villager but -50 food
Archers cost -10% in Feudal Age / -20% in Castle Age / -30% in Imperial Age

name: Spanish
civilization_bonuses: Blacksmith upgrades do not cost any gold
Cannon Galleons benefit from Ballistics (less reload time and more accuracy)
Hand Cannoneers and Bombard Cannons reload 15% faster

name: Incas
civilization_bonuses: Scout Cavalry is replaced by Eagle Warrior

name: Indians
civilization_bonuses: Villagers cost -10% Dark, -15% Feudal, -20% Castle, -25% Imperial

name: Italians
team_bonus: Condottiero also available in allies' barracks in Imperial Age (once you have built a castle)

name: Magyars
civilization_bonuses: Villagers can kill wolves with 1 strike
Forging, Iron Casting, Blast Furnace are free
Scout Cavalry, Light Cavalry, Hussar cost -15%

name: Berbers
civilization_bonuses: Stable units cost -20% (starting in Castle Age)

name: Ethiopians
civilization_bonuses: Receive +100 gold and +100 food when advancing to the next age

name: Malians
civilization_bonuses: Barracks unit +1 pierce armor per age

name: Portuguese
civilization_bonuses: Can build Feitoria in Imperial Age

name: Burmese
civilization_bonuses: Infantry +1 Attacks per Age (starting in Feudal Age)
team_bonus: Relics are visible on the min map

name: Khmer
civilization_bonuses: Prereq buildings aren't required to advance to further ages or unlock other buildings

name: Vietnamese
civilization_bonuses: Reveals enemy positions at game start
Archery Range units have +10% HP in Feudal Age, +15% in Castle Age, and +20% in Imperial Age. Does not stack.
team_bonus: Have access to Imperial Skirmisher Upgrade
